name: breaking-change
description: The issue or pull request documents or introduces a breaking change.

name: bugfix
description: The pull request fixes an incorrect functionality or behaviour.

name: build
description: The pull request updates build configuration and scripts.

name: chore
description: The pull request updates dependencies or configuration files.

name: ci
description: The pull request updates CI workflows.

name: docs
description: The pull request updates comments or documentation.

name: feature
description: The pull request implements new functionality.

name: future-release
description: The pull request will be included in a future release.

name: needs-changes
description: The pull request needs additional changes before it can be merged.

name: needs-discussion
description: The issue or pull request needs more discussion before it can be closed or merged.

name: needs-documentation
description: The pull request needs additional documentation before it can be merged.

name: needs-information
description: The issue needs more information before it can be verified and resolved.

name: needs-investigation
description: The issue needs more investigation before it can be verified and resolved.

name: needs-review
description: The issue or pull request needs a review by a developer of the team.

name: needs-testcase
description: The issue or pull request relates to a feature that needs test coverage.

name: next-release
description: The pull request will be included in the next release.

name: on-hold
description: The issue or pull request is not being worked on for the time being.

name: performance
description: The issue or pull request relates to performance.

name: refactor
description: The pull request improves or enhances an existing implementation.

name: regression
description: The issue is a bug that relates to functionality known to work in previous releases.

name: security
description: The issue documents functionality that could expose private data or cause harm otherwise.

name: style
description: The pull request ensures styleguide compliance.

name: test
description: The issue or pull request is related to unit tests for testing individual elements.

name: wont-fix
description: The issue is legitimate, but it is not something the team is currently able or willing to work on.
